```{r}
main_data <- read.csv("results_df.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

essays_data = main_data[main_data$dataset == "essays",]
essays_model = lm(main_model_on_rewritten ~ model + feature + LLM_model + label + rewritten_type + main_model_on_org, data = essays_data)
summary(essays_model)
```
